mdRecord.dcterms:title: Iron-Gate, Alleghany County Virginia, August, 1889 / Dunlap and Kennaday, Engineers
Iron Gate, Alleghany County Virginia, August, 1889
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 57 x 76 cm. on sheet 60 x 79 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows street names, lot and block numbers, manufacturing sites. [original]
Map oriented with north towards lower right. [original]
Note: Iron Gate. The location is one of the healthiest and most beautiful in the South ... For further information address Iron Gate Land and Improvement Co. Iron Gate Virginia. [original]
Small b&w vignette just to right of title: The Gate. [original]

Two map insets: 1. upper left-- untitled locater map (col.) of mid-Atlantic and northeastern USA showing radial distances at 100 mile intervals -- 2. lower center--untitled b&w locater map of vicinity of Iron Gate with radial distances at 5 mile intervals. [original]
Annotated with handwritten notes about the lots acquired by the "Staunton Syndicate." [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Fragile, with several tears. [original]
